title: SLD
summary: An SLD (Second Level Domain) is the part of the domain name that is located right before a Top Level Domain (TLD). For example, in mozilla.org the SLD is mozilla and the TLD is org.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
